About.title: About Me
About.intro: Hello! My name is Shuja, and I’m originally from Afghanistan. I’ve lived in Canada since the age of 7 and am currently based in the greater Montreal area.
About.journey: My journey into technology began at a young age, fueled by a curiosity about how things work—whether it’s websites, video games, or innovative tech solutions. This curiosity led me to pursue a program in Computer Science at Cégep Édouard-Montpetit, where I graduated in 2023. Since then, I have been deepening my skills in modern web development on platforms like Udemy.
About.passion: I’m passionate about continuous learning and enjoy exploring new trends and skills. I love collaborating with others, as working with people brings fresh perspectives and enhances creativity. In my free time, I enjoy gaming, which not only entertains me but also sparks my imagination.

frontEnd.title: Front-End
frontEnd.description: As a front-end developer, I specialize in crafting visually appealing and responsive user interfaces. My proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript enables me to develop dynamic web applications. I use frameworks like React and Angular to enhance user interaction and streamline navigation. Additionally, I use Bootstrap for quick and efficient styling, and Tailwind CSS for rapid design adjustments without sacrificing quality.

backEnd.title: Back-End
backEnd.description: On the back-end, I leverage technologies such as Node.js and ASP.NET Core to build robust servers and manage databases effectively. Node.js empowers me to create scalable applications that can handle real-time data, while ASP.NET Core provides a solid foundation for developing high-performance web applications. I also work with SQL Server to design and optimize databases, ensuring data integrity and efficient query performance. Additionally, I use Firebase for real-time database capabilities and user authentication. Git is an essential tool in my workflow for version control, enabling collaboration and maintaining a clear project history.
